favourite.article: This hymn is written by Fanny Crosby. Some hymnals show this hymn as written by Henrietta Blair, which was a pen name of Fanny Crosby's. The original hymn is quite different and does not have a chorus: ------------------------ 1 Thy Holy Spirit, Lord, alone, Can turn our hearts from sin; His power alone can sanctify And keep us pure within. -------------------- 2 Thy Holy Spirit, Lord, alone Can deeper love inspire; His power alone within our souls Can light the sacred fire. ------------------------- 3 Thy Holy Spirit, Lord, can bring The gifts we seek in prayer; His voice can words of comfort speak, And still each wave of care. ---------------------- 4 Thy Holy Spirit, Lord, can give The grace we need this hour; And while we wait, O Spirit, come In sanctifying power.
